formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Windows Azure.

formElement.label: Network Security Rule:
formElement.documentation: Name of the network security rule to be created.

formElement.label: Network Security Group:
formElement.documentation: Network security Group in which network security rule is to be created.

formElement.label: Resource Group Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the resource group in which network security rule will be present.

formElement.label: Access:
formElement.documentation: Network traffic is allowed or denied.

formElement.label: Description:
formElement.documentation: Description for this rule. Restricted to 140 chars.

formElement.label: Source Address Prefix:
formElement.documentation: Source address prefix. CIDR or source IP range. Asterix "*" can also be used to match all source IPs. Default tags such as 'VirtualNetwork','AzureLoadBalancer' and 'Internet' can also be used.

formElement.label: Source Port Range:
formElement.documentation: Source Port Range. Integer or range between 0 and 65535. Asterix "*" can also be used to match all ports.

formElement.label: Destination Address Prefix:
formElement.documentation: Destination address prefix. CIDR or source IP range. Asterix "*" can also be used to match all source IPs. Default tags such as 'VirtualNetwork', 'AzureLoadBalancer' and 'Internet' can also be used.

formElement.label: Destination Port Range:
formElement.documentation: Destination Port Range. Integer or range between 0 and 65535. Asterix "*" can also be used to match all ports.

formElement.label: Direction:
formElement.documentation: The direction of the rule.InBound or Outbound. The direction specifies if rule will be evaluated on incoming or outcoming traffic.

formElement.label: Priority:
formElement.documentation: The priority of the rule. The value can be between 100 and 4096. The priority number must be unique for each rule in the collection. The lower the priority number, the higher the priority of the rule.

formElement.label: Protocol:
formElement.documentation: Network protocol this rule applies to. Can be Tcp, Udp or All(*).

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
